summary: A young rape victim tries desperately to pick up the pieces of her life, only to find herself at the mercy of a would-be rescuer.
cast: Carroll Baker|Ralph Meeker|Mildred Dunnock|Jean Stapleton|Martin Kosleck|Charles Watts|Clifton James|George L. Smith|Doris Roberts|Ken Chapin|Anita Cooper|Ginny Baker|Tanya Lopert|Nancy Baker|Virginia Baker|Reid Cruickshanks|Robert Dahdah|Mike Dana|Roger De Koven|William Hickey|Duke Howard|Diane Ladd|Warren Lyons|Jane MacArthur|Charles Matthews|Logan Ramsey|Peg Shirley|Evelyn Wall
keywords: despair|rape victim|blood|kicked in the face|reference to shakespeare's as you like it
title: Something Wild
